name: This Game Is Impossible!
description:
Trailer- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1iEmIJh9rt4&feature=youtu.be

WARNING- A few people may experience epileptic seizures when viewing flashing lights or patterns. Please consult your physician if you have an epileptic condition or experience any unusual symptoms while playing games.

Do you like a challenge?

Well then this game is for you, because this game is impossible.

Or is it?

It depends how much skill you have.

Do you have what it takes?
